title: Practitioner Competency Development Course for Designing and Utilizing Learning Analytics Dashboards

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Focused on designing and utilizing effective learning analytics tools in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric) for current practitioners responsible for vocational language education

learning_goals: Ability to analyze core metrics (engagement, discussion patterns) of learning analytics dashboards and apply them to instructional design
Ability to design analysis tools tailored to educational field needs by applying Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology
Ability to improve learner interaction by utilizing dashboard visualization strategies considering sociocultural perspectives
Ability to propose dashboard utilization plans executable even in limited technological environments (smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
